text: Michael Anthony Tavera (born September 24, 1961) is an American composer best known as his animation score. He has also worked on countless television series, live-action films and direct-to-video sequels. == Biography == Tavera grew up in Los Angeles. == Filmography == === Film === === Television === == Video games == === Games === == References == == Other websites == * Category:1961 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Video game composers
title: Michael Tavera
